title: Who Speaks for the Lazy? - "truly lazy" exam

content.question: Based on the author's views in the first paragraph the "truly lazy" would most likely respond to an actual examination question by

choices.label: convincing others to leave the examination room with them
refusing to enter the examination room at all
having someone else answer the question for them
waiting to the last minute before answering the question

content.answer: refusing to enter the examination room at all
